description:
Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oars + Moria! The Most Heinous Combination of Brains and Brawn!
Oars Plus Moriah: Chikara to Zunou no Saikyou Gattai
Oz plus Moria : Force et intelligence, le pire des mélanges !
Оз и Мория – невероятная комбинация силы и интеллекта
نهاية المعركة وشيكة! وجّه الضربة القاضية!
オーズ+モリア 力と頭脳の最凶合体
